overview: Get whisked away to an island paradise where the men's' butts are as warm as the sun and as refreshing as a dip in the cool ocean water. You might have thought that paradise couldn't be improved. In the case of Ibiza, adding Paddy O'Brian and his hot friends takes the Spanish paradise to whole new level. In part one, Paddy thrusts his big "straight" cock up Juan's horny gay hole. If there's anything better than sex on a boat, it's sex on a boat in beautiful Ibiza.
title: Men In Ibiza
